302562.<speed=0>\n『カスタム衣装を登録する』の説明です。\n<br>\n<k:
This will explain Custom Outfit Registration.
You can register a custom outfit for to wear, however, you will need a <%sM_ticket> to do so.
You can set registered outfits by using the "Change Outfit" menu.
Please note that items that are not registered in your Fashion Catalog cannot be used when creating an outfit.

302563.<speed=0>\n<kyodai>に着せる衣装を 登録できます。\n登録には:
<speed=0>
You can register an outfit for <kyodai>.
<%sM_ticket> is required for registration. The
item will be consumed when the
registration is completed.<break>

302564.<speed=0>\n<%sM_ticket>を 持っていません。\nカスタム衣:
<speed=0>
You do not have a <%sM_ticket>. You need
<%sM_ticket> to register or modify a custom
outfit.

302567.<speed=0>\nおしゃれカタログに 登録されていない 装備品は\n衣装とし:
<speed=0>
Equipment that is not registered in the
Fashion Catalog cannot be used as an outfit.
Please set other equipment.

302569.<speed=0>\n衣装が 変更されていません。\n編集をキャンセルしますか？:
<speed=0>
The outfit has not been changed. Do you want
to cancel the edit?
<yesno2><close>

302570.<speed=0>\n衣装が 変更されていません。\n衣装名だけを 変えたい場合:
<speed=0>
The outfit has not been changed. If you want
to change only the outfit name, please change
it in the previous "Rename
Outfit" section.

302573.<speed=0>\n<%sM_ticket>を消費して\nこの衣装を登録します:
<speed=0>
Consume <%sM_ticket> to register this outfit.
Are you sure?
<yesno2><close>

302575.<speed=0>\nその名前では 登録できません。\n他の名前を 設定してくだ:
<speed=0>
The name cannot be registered. Please set
another name.

302576.<speed=0>\nこの衣装を 記録した状態に\n戻しますか？\n<yesno:
<speed=0>
Would you like to restore this outfit to its
recorded state?
<yesno><close>

302578.<speed=0>\n衣装「<%sM_costumename1>」を 登録しまし:
<speed=0>
You have registered outfit
"<%sM_costumename1>"! Would you like to put
your registered outfit on <kyodai>?
<yesno2><close>

302579.<speed=0>\nカスタム衣装の登録内容を 変更しました！\n変更した衣装を:
<speed=0>
You changed the registration details of the
custom outfit! Would you like to put your
modified outfit on <kyodai>?
<yesno2><close>

302580.<speed=0>\n元の色の場合は ツヤを変更できません。\n元のツヤに戻りま:
<speed=0>
The gloss cannot be changed for the original
color. Is it OK if we return to the original
gloss?
<yesno><close>

303124.<speed=0>\nカスタム衣装は 『衣装を変える』から\n<kyodai>に:
<speed=0>
Custom outfits can be put on <kyodai>
from "Change Outfit".

303161.<speed=0>\n今 <kyodai>が着ている\nカスタム衣装の登録内容を:
<speed=0>
You have changed the registration details of
the custom outfit that <kyodai> is
wearing now!
